H0.text: Which wife of Henry VIII had already married twice before she became queen, and married for a fourth time after Henry's death. Catherine of Aragon

H1.text: Which wife of Henry VIII had already married twice before she became queen, and married for a fourth time after Henry's death. Anne Boleyn

H2.text: Which wife of Henry VIII had already married twice before she became queen, and married for a fourth time after Henry's death. Jane Seymour

H3.text: Which wife of Henry VIII had already married twice before she became queen, and married for a fourth time after Henry's death. Lady Latimer

A4.text: Catherine of Aragon married Arthur, Prince of Wales, and then King Henry VIII before becoming queen.

A5.text: Catherine of Aragon was referred to as 'Dowager Princess of Wales' and lived at The More Castle after her marriage to Henry VIII was annulled, with no mention of a fourth marriage after his death.
